course_description: Learn Python from scratch: write real programs, automate tasks, and build a solid foundation for data science, web development, and beyond.
course_overview: This hands-on course takes absolute beginners from zero to confident Python programmers. You will set up a modern development environment, master core syntax and control flow, organize code with functions and modules, and apply object-oriented principles. Along the way you will build mini-projects such as a text-based game, a CSV data analyzer, and a web scraper that reinforce each concept and grow your portfolio.
target_audience: Aspiring programmers, data analysts, scientists, and professionals seeking to automate tasks or transition into tech roles with no prior coding experience.
prerequisites: Ability to install software on your machine
learning_outcomes: Install and configure Python 3 and Visual Studio Code independently
Apply variables, data types, and operators to solve arithmetic and string problems
Construct programs using conditionals and loops to control execution flow
Create reusable functions with parameters and return values to reduce code duplication
Manipulate lists, dictionaries, and sets to store and retrieve collections of data
Implement classes and objects to model real-world entities following OOP principles
Read, write, and parse files in CSV, JSON, and text formats to persist data
Debug runtime errors using exception handling and IDE debugging tools
